response.overview: In this series we meet incredible craftspeople within cycling around the world. Delve into the lives of the best designers, builders, artists, and engineers that devote themselves to creating an incredible riding experience. Each episode celebrates the work of two craftspeople in the world of cycling. In episode one, Caren Hartley of ISEN Workshop, uses her years of experience in artistry, metalwork and 3D sculpture to make frames as functional as they are beautiful. Joe McEwanâ€™s elegant and simplistic designs are informed by 20 years working as an engineer in the aerospace industry. His handmade mountain bikes (built in a garden shed) have proven worthy against even the most advanced industry behemoths.
response.title: Makers Episode 1 - Framebuilders
